channel.title: The Coffee Break Blog
channel.description: The official blog for the world famous coffee store, The Coffee Break

item.title: The Coffee Break Officially Starts Its Blog
item.description: The Coffee Break officially starts its blog! Visit often to find out about our weekly specials, web-only deals, and amusing anecdotes from the world of coffee!

item.title: New Coffee! Peaberry Kona Coffee, Direct from Hawaii
item.description: We now carry Peaberry Kona coffee beans imported from Hawaii. As with all of our beans, our Peaberry Kona coffee beans are certified 100% organic.

item.title: Weekly Special! 10% Off Our Columbian House Blend!
item.description: This week, enjoy our famous Columbian House Blend, 10% off our regular price!
